title: Cobalt Sites Coordinated Polyterthiophene Derivant/Hematite Hybrid Photoanode for Light-driven Water Oxidation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00389F, Communication
Wenhao Shang, Hao Yang, Yingzheng Li, Chang Liu, Ziqi Zhao, Yu Shan, Fei Li, Licheng Sun, Fusheng Li
The cobalt-coordinated polyterthiophene/hematite hybrid photoanode, denoted as Co@PTTh-N/α-Fe2O3, was fabricated to facilitate the photo-driven water oxidation reaction. The optimally aligned energy levels of the PTTh-N/α-Fe2O3 heterojunction promoted charge transfer and...
